rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a north-facing door that adheres to Vastu principles for positive energy. Includes built-in storage and display area.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south and east sides for natural light. Features a modern Chettinad-inspired decor with traditional motifs.
A dedicated dining space integrated within the living room area for family gatherings and social events.
Secluded office room located towards the north-east of the plot to ensure a calm environment, with ample storage and integrated lighting.
A quiet study/library area adjacent to the home office, featuring built-in shelves and soft seating, designed for comfort and concentration.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Main door opening connecting the entrance hall with the living area.
Separates work space from the living area ensuring a quiet office environment.
